title: Implement context-aware next-step suggestions
description: Enhance bootstrap completion messages and command outputs with context-aware suggestions for what to do next. Based on template type, phase, and project state, provide smart recommendations (e.g., 'Run Phase 0 Step 1' for new Power Query projects, 'Create first task' for standard projects). This reduces user decision fatigue and guides workflow.
notes:
MEDIUM IMPACT - Additional Support. Addresses 'Workflow Discovery' by proactively suggesting next actions. Complements tiered information display (task 90).

COMPLETION NOTES (2025-12-18):
- Enhanced 3 command files with context-aware next-step suggestions:
  * complete-task.md - 8 context scenarios (parent complete, siblings remain, Phase 0 done, high-diff tasks, blocked tasks unblocked, all complete, standard continuation)
  * sync-tasks.md - 8 analysis scenarios (critical risks, high-diff breakdown needed, blocked tasks, confidence declining, momentum stalled, healthy systems, project complete, Phase 0 progress)
  * bootstrap.md - 4 template-specific paths (Phase 0 enabled, initial tasks created, no tasks created, life projects/simple)
- smart-bootstrap.md already had excellent context-aware suggestions (verified, no changes needed)
- All suggestions include time estimates and clear action commands
- Suggestions prioritized by urgency (risks > blockers > breakdowns > continuation)
- Task suggestion priority rules established (6 criteria: unblocks, same parent, related tags, high priority, lower difficulty, sequential)
- Task completed at good velocity (70) - clear enhancement patterns, consistent formatting
user_benefit: Users receive smart suggestions for next actions based on project state, reducing confusion about what to do next
